name: Child Of The Night
description:
Child of Night was pitched as a 2nd year major project and is a casual top-down 3D stealth game where the player - a vampire - must sneak around the town and consume their victims before the sun rises.

The games consists of sneaking around a single town and consuming different victims as per your objectives. You have different abilities to aid you in your ambitions; Cloak (renders you invisible), Shade (creates a decoy which guards will follow), Dash (increases your move speed drastically, for a very short period) and Hypnotise (acts as a stunning effect).
